result.eng: They can't live without a car.
result.ga: Ní féidir leo maireachtáil gan charr
result.orig: Ní féidir leo maireachtáil gan charr
result.html: Ní féidir leo maireachtáil gan charrThey can't live without a car.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir leo maireaċtáil gan ċarrThey can't live without a car.

result.eng: Sit in the car and put the safety belt around yourself.
result.ga: Suigh sa charr agus tarraing umat an crios sábhála
result.orig: Suigh sa charr agus tarraing umat an crios sábhála
result.html: Suigh sa charr agus tarraing umat an crios sábhálaSit in the car and put the safety belt around yourself.
result.ponchtml: Suiġ sa ċarr agus tarraing umat an crios sáḃálaSit in the car and put the safety belt around yourself.

result.eng: There is something wrong with this car.
result.ga: Tá rud éigin cearr leis an charr seo
result.orig: Tá rud éigin cearr leis an charr seo
result.html: Tá rud éigin cearr leis an charr seoThere is something wrong with this car.
result.ponchtml: Tá rud éigin cearr leis an ċarr seoThere is something wrong with this car.
